Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • Character
  • public class Character
extends java.lang.Object
    The character class models a character in the game. It contains information about it and methods to implement movement.
    Version:
    30/11/2020
    Author:
    Aleandru Matei

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • checkItemByName

        public boolean checkItemByName​(java.lang.String itemName)
        Checks if a character has an item in their inventory with the name equal to the String you provide.
        Parameters:
        itemName - Name of the item you want to check.
        Returns:
        true if the character has an item with the specified name, false otherwise

      • takeItemByName

        public Item takeItemByName​(java.lang.String itemName)
        Returns the item object with the name you specify, so you can add it someplace else.
        Parameters:
        itemName - Name of the item you're looking for.
        Returns:
        An item object with the specified name, or null if that doesn't exist.

      • moveToRandomNeighbor

        public void moveToRandomNeighbor()
        Moves the character to a random neighboring room, if the player is not in the same room.

      • getCurrentRoom

        public Room getCurrentRoom()
        Returns:
        Returns object of the room the character is in.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        Name of the character.
